Question.Subject: When will the Lockerz PTZ place be open 24/7?
Question.Content: Dont tell me later this year i know that but when? what month? and also When do The games come out and the purple price tag like what is this stuff its is not a scam i order lots of things off of lockerz you idiot just tell me a date
Question.ChosenAnswer:
1st person who answered is dumb...
my friends have gotten loads of stuff off there and its no scam, the only reason i didnt do the march redemption is because im saving up ptz for a wii
apparently it will be " around november " " middle of 2010 " "october 2010 "
ive spent about an hour looking for your answer and thats all i could find sorry...

Answer.Content: Do NOT waste your time on lockerz it is a PROVEN SCAM - FACT

1st person who answered is dumb...
my friends have gotten loads of stuff off there and its no scam, the only reason i didnt do the march redemption is because im saving up ptz for a wii
